title.rendered: IT – Lead Consultant | LifeSciences | LifeSciences – ALL

content.rendered:
Must Have Skills:SAP FICO
Current SAP configuration and module working knowledge in FI and CO
Experience using SAP implementation tools, ASAP, and Solution Consultant preferred
Detailed Job Description:Act as consultant and design architect for SAP FICO global solution. Work with peers in the BT organization and business representatives to determine business process and solution design leveraging the capabilities of the SAP Finance and Controlling modules
Support the identification of opportunities to standardize processes and system configuration globally and ensure compliance across all implementation to these standards
Collaborate with representatives of other SAP functions to ensure end to
Minimum years of experience: 5+

Certifications Needed: No

Top 3 responsibilities you would expect the Subcon to shoulder and execute:

Act as consultant and design architect for SAP FICO global solution. Work with peers in the BT organization and business representatives to determine business process and solution design leveraging the capabilities of the SAP Finance and Controlling modules
Support the identification of opportunities to standardize processes and system configuration globally and ensure compliance across all implementation to these standards
After the implementation, lead and support project initiatives to expan
Interview Process (Is face to face required?) No

Does this position require Visa independent candidates only? No
